com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23
Class ID3v23Tag

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23.ID3v23Tag

public class ID3v23Tag
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for reading and writing an ID3V2.3 tag. It provides direct low level access to the actual ID3v2.3 tag embedded in an .mp3 file. While it is beyond the scope of this class description to explain the complete details of the ID3v2.3 tag, If you need moreinformation about the format of the ID3v2.3 tag, please visit the official ID3 website. The format of an ID3v2.3 tag and its location within an .mp3 file is shown below:

See Also:
ID3 tag version 2.3.0 standard, wikipedia history of ID3 tags, Gigamonkeys ID3 Tag parser

Constructor Detail

ID3v23Tag

public ID3v23Tag()
default constructor.

ID3v23Tag

public ID3v23Tag(java.io.File mp3File)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 ID3v23InvalidTagException,
                 ID3v23InvalidFrameException
constructor.

Parameters:
mp3File - mp3 file whose ID3v2.3 tag is to be read.
Throws:
ID3v23InvalidTagException - the .mp3 file does not contain an ID3v2.3 tag.
ID3v23InvalidFrameException - an invalid frame is read, and it is not possible to skip over it and continue reading the remaining frames.
java.io.IOException - there was an error while reading the ID3v2.3 tag in the .mp3 file.

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()
Returns:
whether the ID3v2.3 tag has been modified.

setBuffer

public void setBuffer()
if the tag's values have been modified, then resize the raw binary buffer and store the new values there. When finished, the dirty flag is reset to indicate that the buffer is up to date, and the frame is now ready to be saved to the .mp3 file.

save

public void save(java.io.FileOutputStream file)
          throws java.io.IOException
save the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - file output stream pointing to the starting location of the ID3v2.3 tag within the .mp3 file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file.

save the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - random access file pointing to the starting location of the ID3v2.3 tag within the .mp3 file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file.
